Commentary: Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, no run, starts on length on the off stump and Simmons guides it towards point
Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, no run, much shorter and going away with the angle, Simmons leaves this time
Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, no run, wider outside off and good bounce again, Simmons shoulders arms this time too
Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, no run, excellent ball - brings the shorter ball closer to the batsman, making him play, but the ball moves away from him and nearly takes the outside edge as Simmons pokes
Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, no run, beats him again! Not as comprehensively as the previous ball but Simmons couldn't get close to it again. He's hardly moving his feet there
Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, no run, bangs it in shorter and towards the ribs, Simmons' bat comes down just in time to defend it
Mohammad Sami to Wessels, no run, length ball not far from off stump, Wessels defends it into the covers
Mohammad Sami to Wessels, no run, 134.5kmh, brings it into the batsman now who is cramped for room and hit high on the pad
Mohammad Sami to Wessels, 1 run, shuffles across early and goes down on a knee to almost sweep that with the angle to long leg and they are off the mark on the ninth ball
Mohammad Sami to Simmons, no run, just short of length outside off, Simmons brings his hard hands down and gets a bottom edge back to the bowler
Mohammad Sami to Simmons, no run, on the off stump now and he pushes it down to mid-off. Better-looking short but no run
Mohammad Sami to Simmons, 1 leg bye, shuffles down the track and the ball deflects off the pad after coming in with the angle, and goes behind square on off for a leg bye
Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, FOUR, makes room and cuts that absolutely square and through the aerial route for a cracking four!
Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, no run, absolutely full and wide now, Simmons hardly moves his feet and reaches out, and misses
Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, FOUR, makes room again and opens up to pull this short ball from the middle of the bat, sends it wide of midwicket for another four

Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, SIX, that's much like how Brendon McCullum batted earlier in the day - makes some room and sends that flying over the long-off boundary for a six! It had good bounce and he just about got on top of that to slap it on the off side
Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, no run, on the stumps now and Simmons defends it back this time
Mohammad Irfan to Simmons, FOUR, opens up by clearing his front leg, gets a full delivery and drills that through the covers all along the ground for the fourth boundary of the over!
Mohammad Sami to Wessels, no run, sharp bowling from Sami. Seamed this one into the batsman from short of length outside off and the batsman had no room to put it away. Defends on the off side
Mohammad Sami to Wessels, OUT, heaves and misses - bowled'im! He went down on a knee to slog on the leg side but the length wasn't good enough to be swept and the ball hit the top of leg stump
Mohammad Sami to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, this one goes straight from outside off and beats the batsman
Mohammad Sami to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 leg bye, Sami appeals for lbw even though that hit him well outside leg and was going down further. Leg bye for Iftikhar
Mohammad Sami to Simmons, 1 run, on length with some room and it's helped to third man easily
Mohammad Sami to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, full and quick at 137kmh outside off, Iftikhar doesn't reach the pitch of the ball and drives and misses

Russell to Simmons, 1 leg bye, quick and towards leg, hits im on the front pad near the knee rool and they sneak in another leg bye. Simmons seems to be in a bit of pain after being hit, but ok to continue
Russell to Iftikhar Ahmed, FOUR, short and pulled for four! Nice back lift and follow through to whack it over the midwicket fielder
Russell to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 leg bye, 138.3kmh, full and quick towards leg, another leg bye

Russell to Simmons, OUT, oh, he's taken a quick reflex catch! Simmons merely pushed the nearly waist-high full toss back towards the bowler and Russell reacted well and grabbed it with both hands to his right before falling over
Russell to Shoaib Malik, no run, 138kph, short and quick around off, he defends it to backward point
Russell to Shoaib Malik, no run, seaming in a bit, no room, and inside edge goes on to hit the pads
Mohammad Irfan to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, bit of angle outside off and Iftikhar guides the ball to third man
Mohammad Irfan to Shoaib Malik, no run, back of length on off, he helps it to backward point

Mohammad Irfan to Shoaib Malik, OUT, heaves to the leg side, gets a bottom edge and Haddin takes it easily! Duck or Shoaib Malik. He opened up early and swung his bat a long way but the ball went under the ball, only after taking an edge
Mohammad Irfan to Bopara, no run, on length on off and Bopara defends it back patiently
Mohammad Irfan to Bopara, no run, on the middle stump now, on length again, and Bopara presents a straight bat again
Wicket: ['Shoaib Malik c †Haddin b Mohammad Irfan 0 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Irfan to Bopara, no run, moves across a bit and Irfan makes the ball chase him, Bopara defends it to gully
Badree to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, shortish ball and he starts with a googly that comes in sharply, beats him to hit him on the pad
Badree to Bopara, no run
Badree to Bopara, FOUR, shortish outside off, he goes for a cut, gets a thick edge and it goes just wide of slip for four
Badree to Bopara, 1 run, better looking shot - drives the fuller one to sweeper cover for one
Badree to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, short and quick out side off, he cuts and misses
Badree to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, targets the stumps and Iftikhar defends it back in orthodox fashion
Russell to Bopara, no run, back of length and angling in, Bopara defends it softly to leg
Russell to Bopara, 1 run, nicely driven this time, between backward point and cover point for one
Russell to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, excellent yorker on the off stump, inside edge goes to leg and they sneak in a single
Russell to Bopara, 1 run, shorter now and he pulls it to deep midwicket for one
Russell to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, too full and he hammers it back but straight to Russell
Russell to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, angling in towards leg and he clips it to deep square leg for one
Badree to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, flatter on middle and leg, nudged to the leg side

Badree to Iftikhar Ahmed, OUT, can't keep Russell out of the action, can you? Takes a good catch running to his right from long-on. It was a short ball on off, Iftikhar pulled it high but couldn't send it too far. Dre Russ ran in and to his right and got under it just in time
Badree to Bopara, 1 run, sweeps from outside off to fine leg for one
Badree to ten Doeschate, no run, fullish on middle and leg, tucked to square leg
Badree to ten Doeschate, 1 run, flighted full toss on leg, driven down to long-on and he's off the mark
Wicket: ['Iftikhar Ahmed c Russell b Badree 8 (14b 1x4 0x6) SR: 57.14']

Commentary: Badree to Bopara, 2 runs, flatter now on middle, Bopara gets into the sweeping position early and sends it fine enough to come back for the second
Imran Khalid to ten Doeschate, no run, little short on the stumps and he defends it back
Imran Khalid to ten Doeschate, no run, fuller on the stumps and it's pushed back to the bowler
Imran Khalid to ten Doeschate, 1 run, fuller on the pads this time and he clips it to deep square leg
Imran Khalid to Bopara, no run, fuller outside office and it's driven to cover
Imran Khalid to Bopara, no run, shuffles down, he pitches it shorter and Bopara pushes it straight to cover again
Imran Khalid to Bopara, 1 run, errs towards the leg side now and Bopara tucks it to deep midwicket easily
Badree to Bopara, 1 run, flat with no turn around off, he goes back and works it to leg
Badree to ten Doeschate, no run, fullish on middle and leg and it's tucked to square leg
Badree to ten Doeschate, no run, googly coming in from outside off, he leans forward and blocks
Badree to ten Doeschate, 1 run, comes down for the shorter ball turning away and helps it with the turn to point for one
Badree to Bopara, 1 run, on the leg side and he sweeps it to short fine leg for one
Badree to ten Doeschate, no run, slower through the air outside off, he tries to punch off the back foot and manages only a bottom edge that doesn't go far
Imran Khalid to Bopara, 2 runs, full on the stumps, driven down to long-on for one
Imran Khalid to Bopara, no run, slides it in towards middle stump and it's pushed to cover
Imran Khalid to Bopara, no run, touch wider outside off it's pushed back to the bowler
Imran Khalid to Bopara, 2 runs, turns it away a bit from off and he drives it to sweeper cover and then do well to come back for the second
Imran Khalid to Bopara, 1 run, too full on middle and it's driven down firmly to long-off
Imran Khalid to ten Doeschate, no run, can't get the sweep too far away as he takes it on the body and the keeper collects on the leg side
Badree to Bopara, 2 runs, flat on the stumps, tucked away to leg off the back foot
Badree to Bopara, 1 run, turns in the googly a little bit and it's helped to leg for one
Badree to ten Doeschate, 1 leg bye, comes down to whip it to leg but gets a leg bye on the off side
Badree to Bopara, 1 run, leans towards the ball and clips it from off to leg for one
Badree to ten Doeschate, 2 runs, fullish on the stumps and he sweeps it with hard hands to fine leg
Badree to ten Doeschate, 2 runs, shortish outside off, he slaps it on the off side and calls for two as it's gone a bit wide of long-off and they complete two
Imran Khalid to Bopara, 1 run, fullish on the pads, clipped down to long-on for one
Imran Khalid to ten Doeschate, 1 run, comes down as the ball comes in with the angle, he defends it to leg for one
Imran Khalid to Bopara, SIX, makes room for the full delivery and sends it flying over the wide long-off boundary for a clean six!
Imran Khalid to Bopara, 1 run, makes room again and this time works it to long on for one
Imran Khalid to ten Doeschate, 2 runs, fullish outside off, he drives through the covers and come back for two again
Imran Khalid to ten Doeschate, no run, shuffles down for the straight delivery, no room for him to put it away
Smith to Bopara, no run, slower ball on off stump and Bopara pushes back to the bowler
Smith to Bopara, 2 runs, tailing down the leg, tickles to short fine leg and big 7'1 Irfan does well. Throws off balance and they scamper for the second
Smith to Bopara, 1 run, pitched further up on off and thumped down the ground for a single
Smith to ten Doeschate, 1 run, tad wide on off stump and he chops it wide of point
Smith to Bopara, 1 run, sanunter down the track and punched to vacant on side for a run
Smith to ten Doeschate, 2 runs, played with gentle hands this time around, acres of vacant space on the leg side and they pinch a couple more
Mohammad Irfan to Bopara, 1 run, low full toss from round the stumps and punched to cover. Skipper dives and does well.
Mohammad Irfan to ten Doeschate, 1 run, altered hes length and dragged it back a bit and awkwardly pulled to square leg
Mohammad Irfan to Bopara, no run, lovely shot, but finds point. Tad wide on off stump, waited for the ball and slapped straight to the fielder.
Mohammad Irfan to Bopara, 1 bye, saw him coming and flummoxes him with a slower one on off stump. Bopara on the move plays all around this one and Haddin fails to gather it cleanly
Mohammad Irfan to ten Doeschate, 1 run, width offered and thwacked to deep cover
Mohammad Irfan to Bopara, 2 runs, back of a length, angled in and a miscued pull eludes short mid-wicket, couple more.
Mohammad Sami to ten Doeschate, no run, short on middle and off and it was too quick for the batsman. Pull and a miss.
Mohammad Sami to ten Doeschate, 1 run, length ball on off stump, Tendo hanging on the back foot and pushes it the sweeper cover

Mohammad Sami to Bopara, OUT, has he picked out the fielder? Yes he has. It was a slower, back of a length ball, and Bopara pulls to deep midwicket off the front foot. Smith sprints in and takes a fine low catch. Hang on, they are checking whether it was a clean take or not. The third umpire is asked to check and replays show it's clean, up goes the finger
Mohammad Sami to Imad Wasim, 1 run, just around the off stump and he helps it towards backward point for a quick single

Mohammad Sami to ten Doeschate, OUT, second wicket of the over and RTD is caught behind! It was shortish outside off, the batsman heaved to the leg side and the ball kissed the bottom edge before falling in the keeper's gloves. What figures from Sami as he removes the two well-set batsmen
Mohammad Sami to Sohail Khan, 1 run, shuffles across a step and works the ball to leg for one
Russell to Sohail Khan, 1 run, sort of length outside off, he helps it wide of backward point for one
Wicket: ['RS Bopara c Smith b Mohammad Sami 37 (36b 1x4 1x6) SR: 102.77']

Commentary: Russell to Imad Wasim, 1 run, towards the hips and he works it away to fine leg for one
Russell to Sohail Khan, no run, bangs in the short ball, Sohail pulls and misses it completely
Russell to Sohail Khan, 2 runs, connects well this time and finds the gap too! It was short and he pulled it away between deep midwicket and long-on, for two
Wicket: ['RN ten Doeschate c †Haddin b Mohammad Sami 16 (23b 0x4 0x6) SR: 69.56']

Commentary: Russell to Sohail Khan, 1 run, full outside off now and he lofts it down to long-off for one
Russell to Imad Wasim, FOUR, bit too full around the off stump and he whips it away with a big swing, in the gap between deep midwicket and long-on for a four
Mohammad Sami to Sohail Khan, 1 run, back of length outside off, Sohail shuffles across and works it to leg

Mohammad Sami to Imad Wasim, OUT, yes, another one for Sami and it's his fourth today, 100th in T20 matches overall! Back of length well outside off, Imad Wasim cut the ball as he got some room but found the fielder at backward point who didn't have to move much!

Mohammad Sami to Usama Mir, OUT, five-for for Sami! Usama got a short of length ball, he pulled it away but didn't middle it. Russell ran in a long way from long-on and did well to catch it in the end
Mohammad Sami to Sohail Khan, 1 run, good ball outside off and Sohail Khan defends it patiently outside off
Mohammad Sami to Mohammad Amir, 1 run, angling away a bit outside off and it's steered just wide of point for one
Mohammad Sami to Sohail Khan, 4 leg byes, big lbw appeal from Sami as the batsman shuffles across and is hit on the pad, it deflects away and fine on the leg side for four leg byes
Russell to Mohammad Amir, no run, slower one outside off and he swings and misses
Russell to Mohammad Amir, FOUR, low full toss outside off, and he does well to drive that with good timing, between cover and mid-off for a four
Wicket: ['Imad Wasim c Asif Ali b Mohammad Sami 6 (4b 1x4 0x6) SR: 150.00']

Commentary: Russell to Mohammad Amir, no run, short ball now to mix it up, pulls and misses

Russell to Mohammad Amir, 1 leg bye, almost taken in spectacular fashion by Haddin! It came into the batsman from around off stump, deflected off the pad and Haddin dived to his left but it wasn't off the bat, so not a chance put down. Leg bye only
Wicket: ['Usama Mir c Russell b Mohammad Sami 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Russell to Sohail Khan, no run
Russell to Sohail Khan, OUT, slogs the last ball, it's gone very high and Khalid Latif at deep midwicket comes in a few steps to take that comfortably and it's all over with the 20 overs
